name: MDL Technology
tag_list: web-hosting, web-designing, software-designing, it-consultancy, training, hr-consultancy
overview:
The Company was established as a firm in 1997, in Pakistan. The steady growth and the success of MDL TECHNOLOGY & the position it secured as a leading business house were mainly due to the family over vast experience and the trust placed in the company by customer, employees and principals-which today include some of the most renowned names internationally. Since its inception, the goods & services provided by us have led to improve productivity in the business sector, in the graphics solutions, in the information management field and in the transmission projects. We offer a wide array of services, from integration consulting to deployment; from hardware or software upgrades to system migration. Whatever your computing needs are, we have the expertise & the resources to meet your information technology needs. All of MDL TECHNOLOGY solutions and services are focus on several important issues: maximizing the organization’s core competencies through successful implementation of advanced technology, maximizing the organization’s resources through outsourcing & a central point of contact, and minimizing the total cost of ownership through planning & excellent support services. MDL Technology Offer Following Services :

  1. IT Consultancy
  2. Web Solutions
  3. Software Solutions
  4. Network Solutions
  5. Professional Training
  6. HR Consultancy
  7. Common Hardware Solutions

For Complete Details visit us at http://www.mdltechnology.org

offices.address1: 43-C, Second Floor, Stadium Lane 2, Khayaban-e-Mujahid DHA Phase V
